name: Talon Karrde (V)
Lore: 'Smuggler and information broker. Operates intelligence network. Pragmatic businessman. Strong sense of personal honor. Bounty placed on his head by Grand Admiral Thrawn.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. If your [Virtual Block 4] objective on table: aliens are forfeit +2 at Rebel Cell sites; Yerka Mig may deploy on a Rebel Cell site, ignores Jedi, is immune to Alter, and for remainder of game, you retrieve Force with it only once per turn.',
